resultsError: Results could not be calculated. This is often due to a misconfigured strategy or an unresponsive RPC node involved in the strategy.
ticketWithAnyOrBasicError: In order to use the "ticket" strategy you are required to set a voting validation strategy. This combination reduces the risk of spam and sybil attacks. {article}
ticketWithAnyOrBasicErrorSetup: Use of the ticket strategy requires setting a voting validation strategy. To continue go one step back and select the "One person, one vote" option. {article}
resultsCalculating: Final results are being calculated. If you still see this message after a few minutes contact the space admin.
votingPowerFailedMessage: Your voting power could not be calculated. This is often due to a misconfigured strategy or an unresponsive RPC node involved in the strategy. If the problem persists, consider contacting the space admin or our support team on {discord}
votingValidationFailedMessage: We were not able to validate your eligibility to vote. This is often due to a misconfigured vote validation setting or an unresponsive RPC node. If the problem persists, consider contacting the space admin or our support team on {discord}
author: Author
warningSpace: This space has been flagged as potentially malicious. Proceed with caution.
warningShortUrl: Short URLs are not allowed. Please use the full URL.
warningFlaggedProposal: This proposal might contain scams, offensive material, or be malicious in nature. Please proceed with caution.
warningFlaggedSpace: This space might contain scams, offensive material, or be malicious in nature. Please proceed with caution.
linkPreview: This link will take you to {url}.</br> Are you sure you want to continue?
demoSite: This is the demo site, give it a try!
confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove your delegation to
noVotingPower: Oops, it seems you don't have any voting power at block {blockNumber}.
notificationsNotSupported: Your browser does not support notifications
twoChoicesRequired: Two choices are required for this plugin.
noResultsFound: Oops, we can't find any results
noSpacesJoined: Oops, you haven't joined any spaces yet
networkErrorPlayground: Network error - please open your browser console for more information
setDelegationToSpace: Limit delegation to a specific space

newSpaceNotice.mainText: You can change how voting power is calculated via strategies in your {settings}. Changes to your settings will only affect new proposals, existing proposals can not be changed.
newSpaceNotice.learnMore: Learn more in the {documentation} or join Snapshot {discord} for help.

errors.minStrategy: At least one strategy is required.
errors.website: URL should be in the format https://www.example.com
errors.unsupportedImageType: File type not supported, Supported formats are jpeg, jpg and png
errors.fileTooBig: File size should be smaller than 1MB

create.delayEnforced: The space enforces a delay until voting can start
create.periodEnforced: The space enforces the duration of the voting period
create.votingPeriodExplainer: This is the time period in which users will be able to vote. The proposal will be visible and pending before the start of the voting period.
create.uploadImageExplainer: Attach images by dragging & dropping, selecting or pasting them.
create.errorGettingSnapshot: We encountered an error while fetching the snapshot block number which is needed to calculate your voting power. Please try again later.
create.errorTimeInPast: Entered time is in the past. Please select a future time.

delegate.pendingTransaction: no pending transaction | 1 pending transaction | {count} pending transactions
delegate.delegateToSelfAddress: You cannot delegate to your own ENS address
delegate.noDelegationsAndDelegates: Can't find your delegations and delegates? Make sure you are connected to the correct network.
delegate.delegateNotSupported: Delegation is currently not supported for {network}.

postVoteModal.gnosisSafeDescription: Votes with a Safe require additional signers and will be visible once the transaction is confirmed

tips.1: Votes can be changed while the proposal is active

pendingGeneration.title: Your report is currently being generated
pendingGeneration.description: It may take a few minutes. Please check back shortly.

unsupportedEnv.title: Unsupported environment
unsupportedEnv.description: Votes report are not available on demo.

unknownError.title: We're having trouble connecting to the server responsible for downloads
unknownError.description: Please try again in a few moments. If the problem persists, consider contacting our support team.

filtersPopover.title: Filters
filtersPopover.onlyVotesWithReason: Only show votes with a reason

proposals.noProposals: There aren't any proposals here yet!

wrong timestamp.title: Wrong timestamp
wrong timestamp.message:
The message timestamp is not valid. Please check the clock on your device, make sure it is set to the correct date and time and try again.

 If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team on {discord}.

space with ticket requires voting valida.title: Missing voting validation
space with ticket requires voting valida.message:
Your proposal cannot be submitted due to a missing voting validation rule required with the 'ticket' strategy. Please adjust your settings by either using another strategy or adding the required validation.

 If further assistance is needed, contact our support team on {discord}.

space missing proposal validation.title: Missing proposal validation
space missing proposal validation.message:
Your proposal cannot be submitted due to a missing proposal validation rule. To prevent unauthorized proposals and spam, add a validation rule in your space settings.

 For assistance, reach out to our support team on {discord}.

modalTerms.mustAgreeTo: To {action} this space, you must agree to the {spaceName} terms of service.

settings.confirmLeaveMessage: Do you really want to leave? You have unsaved changes that will be lost.
settings.confirmDeleteSpace: Do you really want to delete this space? This action cannot be undone and you will not be able to create a new space with the same ENS domain name.
settings.validationErrorsMessage: Please fix the following fields before saving:
settings.noticeSavedText: New settings only affect future proposals, not existing ones.
settings.connectWithSpaceOwner: You are in view only mode, to modify space settings connect with a controller or admin wallet.

gnosisWrongNetwork.base: Your Gnosis Safe is on the wrong network. Please connect to {network} to {action}.

settings.noRecord: No text-record found. Make sure you have registered {id} domain on {network}, then edit the controller text-record to regain access to the space settings.

terms.label: Terms of service
terms.information: Users will be required to accept these terms once before they can create a proposal or cast a vote

subspaces.label: Sub-spaces
subspaces.information: Add a sub-space to display its proposals within your space. If you want the current space to be displayed on the sub-space's page, the space needs to be added as main space in the sub-space settings to make relation mutual. {docs}

parent.label: Main space
parent.information: The space that this space is a sub-space of will be displayed on the space page

children.label: Sub-spaces
children.information: Related Sub-spaces listed here will be displayed on the space page

strategies.label: Strategie(s)
strategies.information: Strategies are used to determine voting power or whether a user is eligible to create a proposal

network.label: Network
network.information: The default network used for this space. Networks can also be specified in individual strategies

symbol.label: Symbol
symbol.information: The default symbol used for this space, usually the token symbol i.e. BAL for Balancer

members.title: Members
members.information: Members have different roles and permissions within the space.
members.addMembersInformation: Paste an address to add a member. You can add multiple members at once by separating them with a comma.

admin.description: Able to modify the space settings, manage the space's proposals and create proposals

moderator.description: Able to manage the space's proposals and create proposals

author.description: Able to create proposals without having to go through proposal validation

proposalThreshold.label: Threshold
proposalThreshold.information: The minimum amount of voting power required to create a proposal

settings.allowOnlyAuthors: Allow only authors to submit a proposal

quorum.label: Quorum
quorum.information: The minimum amount of voting power required for the proposal to pass

type.label: Type
type.information: The type of voting system used for this space. (Enforced on all future proposals)

settings.hideAbstain: Ignore abstain votes in basic voting results

domain.label: Domain name
domain.info: To setup a custom domain you additionally need to open a pull request on github after you have created the space. {docs}

treasuries.label: Treasury
treasuries.information: Add treasuries of your organization to show them in your space

guidelines.title: Guidelines
guidelines.information: Display a link to your guidelines on proposal creation to help users understand what constitutes a good/valid proposal

template.title: Template
template.information: Start every proposal with a template to help users understand what information is required

changeController.title: Change space controller
changeController.information: Change the controller of this space. This can only be done by the ENS controller.
changeController.disabledInformation: You need to be the ENS owner ({owner}) to change the space controller.

deleteSpace.title: Delete space
deleteSpace.information: Delete this space and all its content. This cannot be undone and you will not be able to create a new space with the same ENS domain name.
deleteSpace.disabledInformation: You need to be the space controller to delete the space

delegationPortal.title: Delegation portal
delegationPortal.information: Please ensure your token adheres to a compatible delegation standard to enable delegate discovery and activity within your Snapshot space.

setup.chooseExistingEns: Choose one of your existing ENS domains to create a space with:
setup.demoTestnetEnsMessage: To create a test space you need an ENS domain on {network}.
setup.toCreateASpace: To create a space, you first need an ENS domain. Enter one below and follow the ENS registration instructions.
setup.helpDocsAndDiscordLinks: Not sure how to setup your space? Learn more in the {docs} or join Snapshot {discord}.
setup.setSpaceControllerExists: The snapshot text-record for this domain has already been set. Choose edit to change it, otherwise you can skip to the next step.
setup.setSpaceControllerInfo: The space controller is the account that will be able to manage the space settings. Additional space controllers (admins) can be added later.
setup.setSpaceControllerInfoGnosisSafe: When creating a space with a Gnosis Safe it's recommended to set the safe address as the space controller. If you don't, you need to follow some additional steps. {link}
setup.explainControllerAndEns: Setting the controller requires a transaction on the {network} which will add a "snapshot" TEXT record to your ENS domain.
setup.confirmToSetAddress: Are you sure you want to set {address} as the controller of the space?
setup.controllerHasAuthority: The controller has full authority over the space settings
setup.waitForTransaction: The transaction need to confirm before you can create your space. {txUrl}
setup.pleaseWaitMessage: This can take a few minutes, please wait while the transaction is being confirmed
setup.notControllerAddress: Please connect with the controller address {wallet} to create the space.

domain.title: Setup your space domain
domain.ensMessage: One thing you need before you can create your own space, is an ENS domain on Ethereum mainnet.
domain.ensMessageTestnet: You can also {link} - a Goerli testnet playground dedicated to testing before creating your space or proposals on Snapshot
domain.invalidEns: This ENS name is invalid. Usually this is due the use of invalid characters during registration.

strategy.title: How would you like to setup voting?
strategy.subtitle: You can change these settings any time.

onePersonOneVote.title: One person, one vote
onePersonOneVote.description: Manage a whitelist of people who can vote or simply allow any address to vote. Every vote is equal and no token is required
onePersonOneVote.whitelistInformation: Specify a number of accounts that can vote
onePersonOneVote.votesEqualInfo: Each vote is equal and no token is required

tokenVoting.title: Token weighted voting
tokenVoting.description: Votes are weighted by a token. The token can be an ERC-20, ERC-721 or ERC-1155 token standard

advanced.title: Custom setup
advanced.description: Select up to 8 strategies with a wide range of options. If you can't find the right strategy for your use case, you can create your own

setup.validationTitle: Who can manage this space and create proposals?

about.delegatorNetworkInfo: Change by switching network in your wallet

notify.ensSet: ENS text record was successfully set
notify.delegationAdded: Well done. Delegate was successfully added

single-choice.label: Single choice voting
single-choice.description: Each voter may select only one choice.

approval.label: Approval voting
approval.description: Each voter may select any number of choices.

quadratic.label: Quadratic voting
quadratic.description: Each voter may spread voting power across any number of choices. Results are calculated quadratically.

ranked-choice.label: Ranked choice voting
ranked-choice.description: Each voter may select and rank any number of choices. Results are calculated by instant-runoff counting method.

weighted.label: Weighted voting
weighted.description: Each voter may spread voting power across any number of choices.

basic.label: Basic voting
basic.description: Single choice voting with three choices: For, Against or Abstain

privacy.label: Privacy
privacy.title: Select voting privacy
privacy.information: The type of privacy used on proposals. (Enforced on all future proposals)

shutter.label: Shutter
shutter.description: Choices are encrypted and only visible once the voting period is over
shutter.tooltip: This proposal has Shutter privacy enabled. All votes will be encrypted until the voting period has ended and the final score is calculated

proposalValidation.label: Validation
proposalValidation.title: Select validation
proposalValidation.information: The type of validation used to determine if a user can create a proposal. (Enforced on all future proposals)
proposalValidation.executionError: There was an error on our side and we could not verify if you are eligible to create a proposal. This is often due to a misconfigured voting validation or an unresponsive API involved in the validation.
proposalValidation.notValidMessage: Oops, you don't seem to be eligible to submit a proposal.
proposalValidation.onlyMemberMessage: You need to be a core member of the space in order to submit a proposal.
proposalValidation.notConnectedMessage: You need to connect your wallet in order to submit a proposal.

basic.label: Basic
basic.description: Use a minimum score along with any strategy to determine if a user can create a proposal.
basic.invalidMessage: You do not meet the minimum balance requirement of {amount} {symbol} to create a proposal.
basic.minScoreHint: The score is calculated with Voting Strategies used by the space.
basic.customStrategiesHint: Calculate the score with a different configuration of Voting Strategies

passport-gated.label: Gitcoin Passport gated
passport-gated.description: Protect your space from spam by requiring users to have a Gitcoin Passport to create a proposal.
passport-gated.invalidMessage: You need a Gitcoin Passport with {operator} of the following stamps to create a proposal: {stamps}

arbitrum.label: Arbitrum DAO votable supply
arbitrum.description: Use with erc20-votes to validate by percentage of votable supply.

votingValidation.label: Validation
votingValidation.title: Select validation
votingValidation.information: The type of validation used to determine if a user can vote. (Enforced on all future proposals)
votingValidation.executionError: There was an error on our side and we could not verify if you are eligible to vote. This is often due to a misconfigured voting validation or an unresponsive API involved in the validation.
votingValidation.notValidMessage: Oops, you don't seem to be eligible to vote on this proposal.

any.label: Anyone can vote
any.description: Anyone with voting power can cast a vote.

basic.label: Basic
basic.description: Use a minimum score along with any strategy to determine if a user can vote.
basic.invalidMessage: You do not meet the minimum balance requirement of {amount} {symbol} to vote on this proposal.
basic.minScoreHint: The score is calculated with Voting Strategies used by the space.
basic.customStrategiesHint: Calculate the score with a different configuration of Voting Strategies

passport-gated.label: Gitcoin Passport gated
passport-gated.description: Protect your proposals from spam and vote manipulation by requiring users to have a Gitcoin Passport.
passport-gated.invalidMessage: You need a Gitcoin Passport with {operator} of the following stamps to vote on this proposal: {stamps}.

labels.noTransactions: There are no transactions to execute
labels.connectWallet: Connect wallet to see execution details
labels.switchChain: Switch your wallet to {0} to request execution
labels.question: Did this proposal pass and does it meet the
labels.confirmVoteResultsToolTip: Make sure this proposal was approved by this Snapshot vote before proposing on-chain. If the Snapshot vote rejected the proposal, the on-chain proposal will be rejected as well and you will lose your bond.
labels.approveBondToolTip: On-chain proposals require a bond from the proposer. This will approve tokens from your wallet to be posted as a bond. If you make an invalid proposal, it will be disputed and you will lose your bond. If the proposal is valid, your bond will be returned when the transactions are executed.
labels.executeToolTip: This will execute the transactions from this proposal and return the proposer's bond.
labels.bondWarning: Bond is greater than users balance
labels.quorumWarning: Quorum did not reach space requirement

poap.no_poap_header: A POAP hasn't been setup for this proposal yet :'(
poap.claimed_header: Congratulations! The POAP has been minted to your collection
poap.loading_header: The POAP is being minted to your collection
poap.success_claim: The POAP has been minted to your collection
poap.error_claim: There was a problem minting the token

progress.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete?
progress.comeBack: Come back after voting is complete to see how this proposal is progressing!
progress.confirmSignature: Signing this message will allow us to authorize your request to update the progress of your proposal.

charts.noVotesYet: There are no votes to visualize yet.

comment_box.title: Comment box
comment_box.edit_modal: Are you sure you want to edit?
comment_box.delete_modal: Are you sure you want to delete?

home.title: Snapshot - Where decisions get made
home.description: Snapshot is an off-chain voting platform that allows DAOs, DeFi protocols, or NFT communities to participate in the decentralized governance easily and without gas fees.

setup.title: Create a space
setup.description: Snapshot is a free, open-source platform for community governance. Create your own space now and start making decisions!

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: See what's happening in the Snapshot community.

create.title: {space} Create proposal
create.description: Create a proposal and start a vote.

settings.title: {space} Settings
settings.description: Change how proposals and voting works in this space.

hal.title: Track proposals for {spaceName}
hal.text: Receive notifications every time a new proposal is created or ends

unsupportedNetwork.switchNetworkToNetwork: To continue, you need to change the network in your wallet to {network}.

wallets.title: Wallets
wallets.empty: This space doesn't have a treasury yet

assets.title: Assets
assets.empty: There are no assets in this contract

emailSubscription.title: Email subscriptions
emailSubscription.description: Subscribe to receive email notifications about your joined spaces and proposals activities.
emailSubscription.inputCaption: You may be asked to sign a message to verify wallet ownership

postSubscribeMessage.successConfirmation: Please click the confirmation link that has been sent to your email.

emailManagement.title: Subscription management
emailManagement.subtitle: Choose the types of email updates that matter to you:
emailManagement.optionNewProposalDescription: Get informed when a new proposal is submitted in your followed spaces.
emailManagement.optionClosedProposalDescription: Get informed when a proposal is closed in your followed spaces.
emailManagement.optionSummaryDescription: Get a weekly report detailing the activity in your followed spaces.

emailResend.title: Verify email
emailResend.description: Email validation letter has been sent to your email address. Please click the confirmation link to complete the subscription.

header.title: Where decisions get made
header.description: Snapshot is a free, open-source platform for community governance. Create your own space now and start making decisions!

aboutPage.description: Snapshot is a decentralized governance platform that makes it easy to create and vote on proposals - all without spending a fortune on gas fees! Plus, our flexible system supports various voting types and strategies, so you can tailor the voting process to your needs.
aboutPage.subDescription: Web3 governance doesn't have to be complicated. Snapshot is the perfect solution for organizations looking for an easy and efficient way to govern their community or organization.
